name: Close Combat Storm Landcruiser
desc:
An autonomous machine that applies the principles of naval combat to land battles, a literal "armed ship that cruises on land."
Equipped with Crawler Track Movement Mechanisms, these Landcruisers are normally used to storm enemy positions, where they can pass over rough terrain such as mud and melting snow despite heavy armor and armaments through their excellent load-bearing capabilities and off-road mobility. When close-combat Landcruisers approach enemy defensive lines in formation, rotating blades raised for battle, most foes will concentrate fire on them, allowing other units the opportunity to unleash their firepower...

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Tattered Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
One wonders what resolve drove its bearer to sign up.

dropMaterial.name: Immaculate Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
One wonders if the exquisite styling might hide a price paid for its owner's promotion.

dropMaterial.name: Frost-Etched Warrant
dropMaterial.desc:
A warrant issued to members of the Fatui Oprichniki.
Adorned by a frost-colored crystal â€” a symbol of glory. One wonders what deeds its bearer must have performed to prove their loyalty and worth.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>The Silent Command</color>
Interrupt the enemy's progress.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.
